desc: San-EZ Gel Hand Sanitizer is an alcohol-based sanitizer designed to help reduce a wide array of harmful microbes on hands. San-EZ Gel Hand Sanitizer comes packaged in a convenient 8 fl. oz. bottle. The Hand Sanitizer is wonderfully essenced with a light hint of shea and aloe fragrance that will keep you feeling fresh.

layout.text:
Essenced with Aloe and Shea Fragrance
70% w/v Ethyl Alcohol
